channel.title: Need help connecting to my server
channel.description: I just received this server source & client from a friend, its still in the beta stages, and i guess its a "Custom" source or whatever. I've tried looking tin the client.java, Gui, and sources for the IP to change. nothing. If anyone could help me out, would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Need help connecting to my server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Post your client’s main thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help connecting to my server
item.dc:creator: @Not_Z Not Z
item.description:
@Not_Z wrote:

I’m still not seeing it. I’ll be completely honest with you i have no idea what im doing here. I haven’t touched anything RSPS related since like, early 2008. Like, WAY back when 317 servers looked the same, and nobody had anything above a 317. All i know is, i cant find anything under serverip, localhost, ip, server, or any variations of those.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help connecting to my server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Not Z:

Checked all 4, found nothing. Anyone care to skype/TV me and help?

One of them are bound to have it, considering that’s where the client initializes…
client.java:
in this method: public static void main(String args[]) {
You should see something like:

Right after that ( in the above line is the address, or what calls the address.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help connecting to my server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Not Z:

So i should be looking client side? Where at client side? I was browsing through the client.java client side and saw somewhere it said “Project Insanity” so its a PI client, where would i look? its not in client.java or gui

It’s a 317 renamed or refactored client. Not a 317 pi client.
pi = server.

client.java
jframe.java
RSApplet.java
Gui.java
There’s 4 places. Start looking

usually you want to look for “server” or “serverip”

Read full topic
